apiDescription: A helper struct for reverse ordering.
This struct is a helper to be used with functions like Vec::sort_by_key and can be used to reverse order a part of a key.
use std::cmp::Reverse; let mut v = vec![1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6]; v.sort_by_key(|&num| (num > 3, Reverse(num))); assert_eq!(v, vec![3, 2, 1, 6, 5, 4]);

trait implementations.name: impl<T> std::hash::Hash for std::cmp::Reverse<T> where T: std::hash::Hash
impl<T> std::clone::Clone for std::cmp::Reverse<T> where T: std::clone::Clone
impl<T> std::cmp::PartialOrd<std::cmp::Reverse<T>> for std::cmp::Reverse<T> where T: std::cmp::PartialOrd<T>
impl<T> std::cmp::Ord for std::cmp::Reverse<T> where T: std::cmp::Ord
impl<T> std::fmt::Debug for std::cmp::Reverse<T> where T: std::fmt::Debug
impl<T> std::cmp::Eq for std::cmp::Reverse<T> where T: std::cmp::Eq
impl<T> std::cmp::PartialEq<std::cmp::Reverse<T>> for std::cmp::Reverse<T> where T: std::cmp::PartialEq<T>
impl<T> std::marker::Copy for std::cmp::Reverse<T> where T: std::marker::Copy
impl<T> std::default::Default for std::cmp::Reverse<T> where T: std::default::Default
impl<T> std::marker::Send for std::cmp::Reverse<T> where T: std::marker::Send
impl<T> std::marker::Sync for std::cmp::Reverse<T> where T: std::marker::Sync
